MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L32 postcode area of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 11:47am. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3:00pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:05pm on 12th January 2021
